type: Tutorial Step - Bring Me Back To Earth!

definition.text: I know! This all sounds too abstract! Let me lay out a few examples!

paragraphs.text: When working in sub-hour time frames and a concept or event—for example, a position—spans multiple days:

You may see multiple triangles! One triangle is drawn at the close of each day, and one last triangle is drawn at the close of the position, or—in case the position hasn't closed yet— at the current datetime.
Statistics and metrics are fragmented too! For example, ROI, Profit Loss, and the evaluation of the position as a hit or a fail are determined daily!
